extractedContext.realStory: A race condition in the data sync layer was discovered two weeks before a major launch, and a team worked non-stop for 72 hours to fix it, ensuring customer double-charges were avoided.
extractedContext.obstacle: A race condition in the data sync layer that could have caused customer double-charges on every order.
extractedContext.keyDecision: Pulling in Sarah, Marcus, and Dev to trace the issue across three services and deploying a fix within 72 hours.
extractedContext.counterfactual: Customers would have been double-charged on every order, leading to significant financial and reputational damage.
extractedContext.metric: Deployment frequency improved from every two weeks to 5-10 times per day.
extractedContext.learning: Having a clear runbook and assembling the right team quickly are critical for resolving high-stakes technical issues.
